etymons.meaning: to be gathered together, assembled; cf. Arab. knf Wehr 1123: bewahren, schützen; umgeben

Infectum-wa.turoyo: 1) gə-mkasyó-way-no-le g-maḥtó-way-no u=qalpāġaʕla, w tre=ǧulehawxa g-kunfó-way-no əmmó-way-no d-lo=ǧoməd
translations: I covered it (rennet extract, m.), put a lid on it (cauldron, f.) and wrapped it with two shawls in order for it not to get cold’
